title: Landing page cleanup, credibility line, and ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo + favicon

requirements.summary: Remove the “Our Simple Process” section so it is not rendered anywhere and preserve anchor scrolling behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The section with heading “Our Simple Process” is removed from the rendered page.
No process step cards (Case Review, Documentation, EPFO Follow-up, Amount Credited) appear anywhere on the site.
The page still scrolls correctly to #services and #contact anchors (no broken navigation/scroll behavior).

file_operations.description: Remove the entire JSX block labeled “Process Section” (heading “Our Simple Process” and the four step cards) so it is no longer rendered; ensure existing scrollToSection calls and the #services/#contact section ids remain unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add the exact credibility line “Helped more than 1000 individuals” in the hero area with responsive, legible styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays the exact English text: “Helped more than 1000 individuals”.
The text is legible against the hero background on common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop).
No other user-facing text is changed unintentionally.

file_operations.description: In the Hero Section content block (near the main heading/subtitle), add a new line that renders the exact text “Helped more than 1000 individuals” and apply Tailwind classes consistent with the existing hero typography/contrast so it remains visible and readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.summary: Add generated ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo assets, show the logo in the hero near the headline, and configure the favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: New logo image assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not served via backend).
The hero displays the logo alongside/above the “ASHA PF CONSULTANCY” headline without breaking layout on mobile or desktop.
A favicon is configured in frontend/index.html and loads in the browser tab.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Add the generated professional wordmark logo asset (indigo/blue palette) as a static frontend file at frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-logo.dim_1200x300.png.
Add the generated icon-only mark as a static frontend file at frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-icon.dim_256x256.png.
Add the generated minimal favicon asset (transparent background) as a static frontend file at frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-favicon.dim_64x64.png.

Integrate the logo into the Hero Section near the “ASHA PF CONSULTANCY” heading by referencing the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-logo.dim_1200x300.png (and/or frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-icon.dim_256x256.png where appropriate) with responsive sizing so the layout remains stable across breakpoints.

Configure the site favicon by adding a favicon link in the document head that references the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/asha-pf-favicon.dim_64x64.png (ensure it loads in the browser tab).
